name: Sky On Fire: Clockwise
description:
Sky On Fire : Clockwise will be a free to play flight simulator.

For the moment , there is only one aircraft available , and there isn't anything to shoot at. But nevertheless, you can still have fun flying the aircraft around , testing hydraulics systems , damage model , guns , and many other things !

But in the future , you will be able to choose from many planes of the western theater , during 1940 to 1942. Such as Bf 109 E , Ju 87, early Spitfires , Beaufighter, D.520   and many more...

Don't be fooled by the low-poly style ,  the game uses realistic physics , airfoil based and as close as possible to the reality !
